column5: so i know its really last minute but i was wondering if you guys can help me out...  i live in Richmond Hill, just north of toronto. Im planning on going fishing early morning tomorrow(boat) and was wondering what are some good spots for fresh water fishing? im new to canada so i dont know much. im willing to travel... so please post which spot you would recommend as well as what fish there is, and bait used.  thx guys
I haven't fished there in years but there should still be pike in Cooks Bay- Lake Simcoe. Really close to Richmond Hill.  Cheers
